We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private BollingerBands _bb;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_bb = BB(symbol, period, k);

// In OnData()
if (_bb.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Standard Deviation", _bb.StandardDeviation);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Middle Band", _bb.MiddleBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Upper Band", _bb.UpperBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Lower Band", _bb.LowerBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Band Width", _bb.BandWidth);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Percent B", _bb.PercentB);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Price", _bb.Price);
    Plot("My Indicators", "BB Current", _bb.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.bb = self.BB(symbol, period, k)

# In OnData()
if self.bb.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Standard Deviation", self.bb.StandardDeviation);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Middle Band", self.bb.MiddleBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Upper Band", self.bb.UpperBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Lower Band", self.bb.LowerBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Band Width", self.bb.BandWidth);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Percent B", self.bb.PercentB);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Price", self.bb.Price);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "BB Current", self.bb.Current);
